Set-up
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(multcomp)
```

```{r}
getwd()
```

Load data
```{r}
ncadstats <- read_csv("Data/DataFigure5/Atg8amChGfpNcad_n.csv")
```

```{r}
ncadstats <- ncadstats %>%
  mutate(Genotype = factor(Genotype, levels = c("Control", "Exp")))
```

```{r}
library(car)
leveneTest(Ncad ~ Genotype, data = ncadstats)
```

```{r}
# Perform t-test
ttest_ncad <- t.test(
  Ncad ~ Genotype,
  data = ncadstats,
  var.equal = TRUE
)

# Extract p-value
p_val <- ttest_ncad$p.value

# Convert p-value to stars
stars <- dplyr::case_when(
  p_val < 0.001  ~ "***",
  p_val < 0.01   ~ "**",
  p_val < 0.05   ~ "*",
  TRUE           ~ "ns"
)

# Create a dataframe for saving
ncad_ttest_df <- data.frame(
  comparison = "Control vs Exp",
  p_value = p_val,
  stars = stars
)

print(ncad_ttest_df)
```

```{r}
# Save to CSV
write.csv(
  ncad_ttest_df,
  "Results/ResultsFigure5/StatsNcadAtg8attest.csv",
  row.names = FALSE,
  quote = TRUE
)
```
